programme.title: The Last Fur Trader
programme.desc: In the early 1950s, In Last of the Fur Traders he returns to the Arctic to share his footage. Hugh Kroetsch worked on the Arctic Ocean as a Hudson's Bay Company engineer and filmed his travels.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP02) When a competitor dies during a bicycle race, Murdoch suspects he was killed by large doses of a mysterious stimulant. Guest star: Sean Cullen.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP31) On parle de l'accessibilité sur le marché du travail à travers l'impact des échanges et des rencontres avec d'autres amputés au sein de l'association «Les amputés de guerre».
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP05) In this episode: Discovering your place. Life on home dialysis may limit physical access to the world, but doesn't stop one person from sharing their creative flair with others.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP07) Elizabeth and Jack work to repair their friendship while Elizabeth takes a special interest in helping a student with a learning disability. Abigail ponders opening a cafe.
Année : 2014

programme.title: You Can't Ask That
programme.desc:
(S01EP07) This episode give us a heartwarming and candid view into the lives of people with Down syndrome, from dating to work and the importance of hugs.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S02EP13) We're roasting and toasting on Four Senses this week! Ed Robertson of the Barenaked Ladies brings his culinary skills to the kitchen as he joins hosts Christine Ha and Carl Heinrich to whip up some seriously roasted and toasted goodness.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
We meet Susan Simmons, an adventure swimmer with multiple sclerosis who assists Paralympic athletes with a weekly exercise routine, and coaching the 'Spirit Orcas' swim group. Follow along as she leads participants through their exercise.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S02EP13) If it ain't broke, don't fix it. But if it is broke, you should. Chris and Alex explore a traditional method of transporting tools and investigate an eco-friendly initiative to repair instead of replace.
Année : 2014

programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Always an active person, Tiffiney Perry continued participating in sports and achieving success after a spinal cord injury in her 20s. Now she and husband Chris support others to enjoy the benefits of sport.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Carlos Biggeman is an award-winning photographer, he's about to publish a book of his work. He was born with Down syndrome, but doesn't see it as a barrier.
Année : 2011

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
